author: dlr
msg: Changed Leonard's format() methods to be static, and made JavaDoc
pointers to interface documentation to reduce documentation

author: dlr
msg: Patch by Leonard Richardson <leonardr@collab.net> to add MessageFormat-style formatting.  Minor adjustments by myself.

author: jmcnally
msg: added a note to fix the use of PropertyDescriptor.  Currently requires that
both getter and setter exist.  We want to allow only one to exist as well.

author: jmcnally
msg: a cleaner patch for the bug in Introspector - just remove its use in favor

author: jmcnally
msg: the bean introspector has bugs that cause it to pick the wrong type for a
property, if there are multiple candidates for the setter.  This leads it to
pick the wrong setter and the getter is left null.  So if the getter turns out
to be null, we must doublecheck.
Since the bean introspector is buggy, this could probably be written cleaner
